alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 3:57PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...Strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ventura and west central Los Angeles Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 355 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and isolated thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout near Port Hueneme, or near Oxnard, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxnard...Thousand Oaks...Simi Valley...Camarillo...Moorpark... Santa Paula...Port Hueneme...Newbury Park...Westlake Village... Oak Park...Somis...and El Rio. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
